  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205421</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Looking East: Thai Bui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schauen Ost: Siamesisches Bui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regarder Est : Bui Thaï</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhar Do leste: Bui Thai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservare Orientale: Bui Tailandese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανατολή: Ταϊλανδικό Bui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Parecer Del este: Bui Tailandés</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Vietnamese born sculptor Thai Bui's extraordinary objects simultaneously communicate a witty humor and penetrating sense loss. This Educator Guide explores the history and traditions of Bay Area Funk, Conceptual art and Minimalism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vietnamesischen getragenen Sculptor siamesischen 
Buis außerordentliche Nachrichten teilen gleichzeitig eine witty 
Stimmung und Durchdringungseinen richtung Verlust mit. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die Geschichte und Traditionen des 
Bucht-Bereiches haben, Begriffskunst und Minimalismus Angst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les objets extraordinaires de Bui thaï soutenu 
vietnamien de sculpteur communiquent simultanément une humeur pleine 
d'esprit et une perte pénétrante de sens. Ce guide 
d'éducateur explore l'histoire et les traditions de la région de 
compartiment se dégonflent, art et minimalisme conceptuels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os objetos extraordinários de Bui thai carregado 
vietnamese do sculptor comunicam simultaneamente um humor witty e uma 
perda penetrante do sentido. Esta guia do educador explora o 
history e as tradições da área da baía funk, arte e minimalism 
conceptuais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli oggetti straordinarii del Bui tailandese 
sopportato vietnamita dello scultore comunicano simultaneamente un 
umore witty e una perdita penetrante di senso. Questa guida 
dell'educatore esplora la storia e le tradizioni di zona della baia 
funk, l'arte e minimalism concettuali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα εξαιρετικά αντικείμενα βιετναμέζικου γεννημένου 
Bui γλυπτών ταϊλανδικού επικοινωνούν ταυτόχρονα μια 
πνευματώδη απώλεια αίσθησης χιούμορ και διείσδυσης. Αυτός 
ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά την ιστορία και τις παραδόσεις του 
φόβου περιοχής κόλπων, εννοιολογικών τέχνης και Μινιμαλισμός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los objetos extraordinarios de Bui tailandés 
llevado vietnamita del escultor comunican simultáneamente un humor 
ingenioso y una pérdida penetrante del sentido. Esta guía del 
educador explora la historia y las tradiciones del área de la bahía 
tienen miedo de, arte y minimalism conceptuales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
